reference.shortdesc: Informal steps allow authors to describe procedural task information without placing each step in an individual container element, which is a requirement of the related steps and steps-unordered elements.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: For example, steps-informal might contain a paragraph that describes more than one step in a single sentence, or it might contain sentences that mix steps together with information about the steps.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The steps-informal element is specialized from the section element in the topic module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: Put the soil in the container any old way. It doesn't really matter how you do it as long as it is at least 12 cm deep. Once the soil is in place, water appropriately and wait.
